title: Rider transfer ticker: Welsford trades DSM for Bora-Hansgrohe, Steels joins Movistar, Mulubrhan steps into WorldTour
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Rider transfer ticker: Welsford trades DSM for Bora-Hansgrohe, Steels joins Movistar, Mulubrhan steps into WorldTour on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
